itemInfo.itemDesc:
Fresh salad with slabs fo meat. 
- Unique effect: All Damage Reduction +3 for 90min
 HP Auto Recovery +5 for 90min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Vinegar
item.desc:
A sour liquid made of fermented grains and fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Fruit and Vegetable Salad, Pickled Vegetables, etc.

item.name: Pork
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Vinegar
item.desc:
A sour liquid made of fermented grains and fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Fruit and Vegetable Salad, Pickled Vegetables, etc.

item.name: Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Grilled Sausage, Seafood Pasta, Meat Soup, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Dressing
item.desc:
A sauce with soft flavor and texture.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Seafood Mushroom Salad, Fish Filet Salad, etc.
